fields.name: id
fields.description: Each organization must have a unique identifier.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The official or public name of the organization.

fields.name: alternate_name
fields.description: Alternative or commonly used name for the organization.

fields.name: description
fields.description: A brief summary about the organization. It can contain markup such as HTML or Markdown.

fields.name: email
fields.description: The contact e-mail address for the organization.

fields.name: url
fields.description: The URL (website address) of the organization.

fields.name: tax_status
fields.description: Government assigned tax designation for for tax-exempt organizations.

fields.name: tax_id
fields.description: A government issued identifier used for the purpose of tax administration.

fields.name: year_incorporated
fields.description: The year in which the organization was legally formed.

fields.name: legal_status
fields.description: The legal status defines the conditions that an organization is operating under; e.g. non-profit, private corporation or a government organization.
